text: there are many reasons

text: A comment left by sock was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MortisInvictus, fakedaisies, Lokiamis)

name: mortshire
text: i like how ray looks away from his computer, in a pose out of antiquity as he contemplates.  i should look so sly as i do the same.

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by BlueWindow, mistlethrush, Patware)

name: closefriend
text: Is this how Ray got all his connections? I hope the police chief, Mayor C, and Dr. Andretti were all cold-called with the threat of a racist past.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: no...he just is all sorts of dumb lucky.

name: tombsgrave
text: I want to hear more about the mysterious Grenchmen and their sausage-legged racism.

name: zeroasalimit
text: YES! I've been looking for the perfect name for my Nazi Punk band and now I've found it!

name: unfun
text: Ray looks like he doesn't care.  But really, he does, because he knows a six hundo is class money.

name: catachresis
text: Insane that this is the first mention.

name: dovey
text: Agreed. This strip means business. Another uncanny use of continuity from Onstad

name: excusemesenator
text: If Simon had agreed to it, then wouldn't that be a violation of the rules of the Underground and such?

name: justdan
text: The Operator put him through! Man, I get no kind of service like that from AT&T.

name: clockworkorange
text: Well that's because you're not a Platinum Reserve member.

name: drskradley
text: Cowell has a point when he says "Look", and that point is "Fuck off."

name: methadone
text: once again, six hundo pops up

name: spinynorman
text: Take picture of Simon, change the hair to blonde, boom, it's now a picture of Gordon Ramsay.

name: dallovich
text: Look how Ray is at the computer in the last panel, he was totally makeing new photoshop threats to new celebrities!

name: saru
text:
It deeply amuses me that Simon le Cowell needs to define that he wasn't in a racist highschool band named the Grenchmen.
He leaves completely open the possibility of being in a racist highschool band named something else, or a racist college band named the Grenchmen (or anything else for that matter).

name: thumbfinger
text: The punchline came in panel 4 for me. "Funny how Photoshop disagrees." is pure gold.

name: corpsey
text: Ray knows it's "Le Cowell" and will just not be told.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Onstad: Success With Four Slices Left

"Bacon is simple, like a man smoking a cigarette on a train platform in Budapest. He doesn't need you, and he doesn't care if anyone cares about you. He's perfect at what he does, which is make everything porous smell like him. If a wolf ate him, the wolf would be named after him. The wolf would stink forever, and no hunter would place much value on his pelt."

name: lylebot
text:
I hope the 3.9 this one currently has is a high 3.9. i.e. if I click that 5, it better jump up to 4.3 or so.

Tell me how "funny how Photoshop disagrees" doesn't get a 4.3.

name: tekende
text: Interesting that Ray immediately goes the extortion route rather than reasonably laying out his idea and seeing if Simon might be interesting in such a project.

name: rumblefish
text: UPON CONTEMPLATION = three hours trying to make the first image of Simon Le Cowell to come up on Google look 17 and racist using the airbrush tool.

name: rumblefish
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: fineoakstructure
text: Ahh, the lens flare is the perfect touch; it is exactly the kind of effect that Ray would use were he to Photoshop.

name: atticusonline
text: Okay, yeah, I see it. Thanks. That's Perfect. That is exactly the picture that I needed.

name: i_love_kate
text: Terrifying, if this image ran on the front cover of any British tabloid (speech bubbles included) its effect on the British working class would probably actually be enough to destroy Cowell's career. Or, worse, make him more popular.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Ray went about this in completely the wrong fashion.  Had he approached it differently, Simon might have done this shit for free.

name: rumblefish
text: It's true. I think the poor testing of his DVD case idea knocked Ray of his game briefly and he rolled the dice on this pitch.

name: omegatron
text: In the seventh panel, Ray realizes that Photoshop is harder to use than he thought.

name: wonelove
text: No, the seventh panel is more like after he's been sitting in front of his computer for about six hours trying to paste a box of Simon's face on top of a portrait of Hitler.
